entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow squalls changing to flurries this morning. Blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 70 gusting to 100 early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
